contentrichtext.text: '''Zingarelli''' is the classic modern [[Italian language|Italian]] monolingual [[dictionary]].<ref>{{cite news|title=Zingarelli 2003 - Evvai col vocabolario |accessdate=3 November 2012|newspaper=[[Il Sole 24 Ore]]|date=December 29, 2002}}</ref> Described as a ''Vocabolario della Lingua Italiana'' di [[Nicola Zingarelli]], it is published annually by the [[Zanichelli]] [[publishing house]].<ref>{{cite news|last=Simona Peluso|title=Arriva lo Zingarelli 2012; ecco i neologismi che ne faranno parte|url=http://www.infooggi.it/articolo/arriva-lo-zingarelli-2012-ecco-i-neologismi-che-ne-faranno-parte/19091/|accessdate=3 November 2012|newspaper=Info Oggi|date=October 18, 2011}}</ref> The first edition is dated 1917.<ref>{{cite news|title='Gollonzo', 'emo' e 'shot': nuove parole per lo Zingarelli|url=http://qn.quotidiano.net/cultura/2010/09/30/392538-gollonzo_shot.shtml|accessdate=3 November 2012|newspaper=[[Quotidiano.net]]|date=September 30, 2010}}</ref> The more modest, single volume ''Zingarelli minore'' is better value for the student of Italian. It is heavily illustrated, and contains many useful appendices. == References == <references/> [[it:Nicola_Zingarelli#Il_Vocabolario]] [[Category:Italian dictionaries]] [[Category:1917 books]]
